title: Web Development
description: We build fast, efficient, modern custom webites using the latest technologies (like Svelte, Eleventy, Angular and Tailwind CSS) that will get you noticed. We don't cut corners. We don't use templates, WordPress or other "no code" solutions. We design and build websites from scratch, make sure that they're pixel perfect, and strive for 100 Lighthouse scores across the board for performance, accessibility, best practices and SEO. No compromise.

sections.heading: Web Developer
sections.text: A web developer is perpetually in learning mode. It's a constant evolution as new technologies replace old ones at an accelerating pace. It never gets old. Literally. Unfortunately, developers do. However, with age comes experience and knowledge. The accumulation of that knowledge over many years makes every new thing a little bit easier to master.

sections.heading: Code
sections.text: Code comes in many flavours... and although each language has its particular syntax, and each framework has its pros & cons, in the end they're not all that different. However, some are better than others. The key is to select the right tools for the job and to write as little code as possible. Easier to maintain. Lighter. Faster. Better.

sections.heading: Mobile First Design
sections.text: Current browser stats show that web traffic is continuously trending towards mobile platforms with just under 60% share, followed by desktops with 38%, and tablets trailing with less than 2.3%. So, in most cases, it makes sense for web development to follow a mobile first design paradigm, rather than the other way around. Build the site for mobile, then make sure it also works well and looks good on a desktop/laptop.

sections.heading: Collaboration
sections.text: We know web technologies. That's our jam. What we don't know is your business. That's your domain. You have the knowledge base, the expertise, and know all the little intricacies & nuances that make you the success that you are. That's why we always approach web projects as a collaboration. By bridging our world with yours, we can build unique solutions that meet your specific needs.
